data.title: Bath Family Home in Silver Berry2333 29A Ave NW Edmonton – Rent to Own Edmonton – 911Homes.ca
data.text:
Description

Opportunity Is Knocking…

This 3+1 bedrooms, 2+2 baths, fully finished basement and brand new double detached garage is waiting for you to call it home!

Wow! Imagine yourself coming home to a place that is minutes away from everywhere in Edmonton: close to Anthony Henday and Whitemud drive, Schools, Meadows Recreation Centre, shopping and tons of other amenities.

Located in the great community of Silver Berry, just next to Millwoods, couldn’t get a better location for your new two-story home.

A Home You Can Be Proud Of!

Once you get in, the warm colors of this home will enchant you with its multiple windows welcoming and inviting you to sit and relax in your living room after a long day at work.

Warm even when it’s cold outside!! This stylish interior boasts warm colors with laminate flooring to offer a truly comfortable space for the whole family.

The Open Concept Kitchen And Your Formal Dining Room

Are The Perfect Size To Entertain Friends And Family

In Style And Comfort.

Your well-designed kitchen is ready for you to cook your favourite recipes and make them a success.

There you will find tons of cabinets, a huge pantry that won’t leave you out of storage space, a stove, fridge and a dishwasher.

The cherry of the cake is the breakfast bar area that will make your mornings a breeze.

Here, in the main floor you also have a very conveniently located half bathroom!

With 3 Bedrooms On The Upper Floor,

This Is The Perfect Home For A Family.

Your Master Bedroom Talks About Intimate and Cozy! Plenty of storage closet for her (room for him too…if she lets you) and warm colors to keep you relaxed.

Your Master Bedroom Comes With A 3-Piece Ensuite Bathroom

Your very own get away! The best part is that you don’t have to share it with the kids.

Your 2nd Bedroom, The Perfect Space For Children!

With Great Size Closet, Plenty Of Natural Light…

It Also Can Be Easily Transformed Into Your Own Private Office!

Your 3rd bedroom offers More Great Space for Children or A Spare For Family & Friends…

Or Whatever You Want It To Be – Nice To Have Options!

Wow! Beautiful Main Bathroom with ALL the Bells and Whistles! Modern Soaker Tub and spectacular surround. It Can Be Hard to Create Comfort, Style and Functionality…Yet Here It Is!

But wait, there’s more! Your Basement Is Fully Finished with a huge family room with dimmer lights, and all speaker pre-wired for Your Dream Home Theatre… OR the Ultimate Kid Zone While You Entertain Upstairs… OR Just a Quiet Spot for Mom & Dad to Relax Alone!

In this level you also have a very large 4th bedroom or your very own quiet office space (totally your choice!)

Also for your convenience, in this level you have the Fourth Half Bathroom!

Speaking of the man of the house…

Do You Like Mechanics?

Need An Exterior Workshop?

Need Lots Storage Space?

You will be amazed of the brand new double garage. Completely Your Private Shop for Anything! Store the Quads Safely, Work on Your Toys, Plenty of Room for Anything You Want!

Your Backyard gives you plenty of room for Kids to Play, or Just enough space to Relax Or Entertain in a warm summer BBQ day with friends and family…

Location, location, location, in itself makes this home one of a kind. Whether you have a young family or are close to retirement, the surroundings will offer you convenience and proximity to work, schools and leisure.

The Silver Berry Community offers you a friendly, safe, and quiet environment to enjoy quality of life.

Proposed Rent to Own Plan
